original_title: The Pussycat Dolls - Live From  London
overview: The Pussycat Dolls wow a sold-out London crowd with this live performance of songs from their multiplatinum-selling album, including "Don't Cha," "Beep," "Stickwitu," "I Don't Need a Man," "Wait a Minute," "Buttons" and more.
title: The Pussycat Dolls - Live From  London
